title: BRIEF-Moody's Says Indonesian Vehicle Finance Companies Face Lower Liquidity Risk Than Those In India, Thanks To Stronger Profitability
text:
BRIEF-Moody's Says Indonesian Vehicle Finance Companies Face Lower Liquidity Risk Than Those In India, Thanks To Stronger Profitability

Stock Markets 32 minutes ago (Oct 18, 2019 15:36)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Moody's Says Indonesian Vehicle Finance Companies Face Lower Liquidity Risk Than Those In India, Thanks To Stronger Profitability Oct 18 (Reuters) - * MOODY'S SAYS INDONESIAN VEHICLE FINANCE COMPANIES FACE LOWER LIQUIDITY RISK THAN THOSE IN INDIA, THANKS TO STRONGER PROFITABILITY * MOODY'S SAYS A KEY RISK FOR VEHICLE FINANCE COMPANIES IN BOTH INDONESIA AND INDIA IS THEIR HEAVY RELIANCE ON SHORT-TERM WHOLESALE FUNDING

BRIEF-Moody's Says Indonesian Vehicle Finance Companies Face Lower Liquidity Risk Than Those In India, Thanks To Stronger Profitability
description: BRIEF-Moody's Says Indonesian Vehicle Finance Companies Face Lower Liquidity Risk Than Those In India, Thanks To Stronger Profitability
